resources.string:
This program is open source under the GPL agreement at Github and should not be used for commercial purposes.
 The birth of this program is inseparable from the following open source projects:
 UnityStudio, miniz, VirtualXposed, AndroidP7zip, ExFilePicker, android-about-page, CheckVersionLib, AndroidImageSlider. 
 Thanks to the following translator:
 Traditional Chinese - 栗子
 Russian - onemeshnig
 Korean - Bebridge

Enabled modules: %d
Installed modules: %d
Installed add-on: %d
Visible applications: %d
Applications in VirtualApp: %d
WARNING! Failed to delete module file: %s!
Failed to create directory! Please make sure the Storage permission has been granted in Settings.
Click to generate mapping file (external resources need to download first)
Navigate to home to install client first. Make sure the client installation source is not uninstalled or deleted.
Failed to install module! Please clear the app data and try again, or go to bilibili to seek for help.
Failed to modify OBB file! Please make sure the installed client has corresponding OBB file, or toggle off OBB patch and try again.
Failed to grant root permission! Please make sure your device has been rooted, or switch to another APK resource modification mode and try again.
Failed to grant Phone permission! Please make sure the Phone permission has been granted in Settings. This app wouldn\'t run if Phone permission is not granted.
No information can be viewed in this module.
Enter password [%s], wrong password tried count: %s
Changelog: %s \n\n If failed to update, please go to https://github.com/xausky/UnityModManager/releases and manually download APK.
Successfully installed! You can tap to create game shortcut in the Settings panel.
Please install a client and download hotfix first.
Please make sure there have at least one modifiable source.
Please install a client first to generate the index.
External module directory import mode. NOT recommended for non-mod developers.
External module changes detected! game will restart.
Failed to export the integration package! Please make sure the Storage permission has been granted in Settings.
Select how to modify the resources in the APK. If you select "No modification", APK resource wouldn\'t be modified, you can continue to use persistent resource patches.
Provide Unity\'s PersistentDataPath path resource patch support, such as \"Honkai Impact 3\" UC version.
Click to export the patched APK file to out.apk in the internal storage root directory.
You can open the game directly from desktop in the virtual environment without opening the manager.
Unable to export integrated package No Modify APK mode
VirtualApp Model doesn\'t exist in manager, create shortcuts failed. You can directly open the app directly in app drawer.
Android OBB patch resource file support
ONLY toggle on if your app supports OBB file patching, such as \"Honkai Impact 3\" JP server, SEA server and global server.
Using OBB support without changing APK mode may cause the game fail to start!
View conflicted module file information, this can let module authors easy to debug.
Valid module files [%s] is zero. Please make sure file mapping is generated correctly.
Module [%s] unzip error, please make sure the module file doesn\'t corrupted.
This feature is not available for non-virtual mode.
Does the legacy module has been deleted in original cilent?
Copy login information to clipboard to import other devices. Root permission is required.
Import the login information from the clipboard into the device.
Copying login information failed, unsupported game!
Failed to copy login information, make sure Root permissions and game are logged in!
Failed to import login information, it seems that there is no login information in Clipboard!
Failed to import login information, unsupported games!
